movies.title: Bruc, the Manhunt
movies.plot: 1808. The Napoleonic Army suffers its first defeat at the hands of a single man: a drummer boy who used the Montserrat mountains to echo his drums and send the enemy troops into a panicked retreat. When the news reaches Napoleon, he furiously orders the captain of the Imperial Guard to bring back the head of the young hero responsible for his army's defeat. The captain gathers together a band of his best and most deadly men and so begins the hunt to death of the soldier who was to become a legend.
movies.simplePlot: 1808. The Napoleonic Army suffers its first defeat at the hands of a single man: a drummer boy who used the Montserrat mountains to echo his drums and send the enemy troops into a panicked ...

biography.bio: Juan José Ballesta was only nine when he debuted in the TV series Querido maestro (1997) but his real break came when director Achero Mañas gave him the title role in his sensitive Truffaut-like tale of two youths El Bola (2000). The film garnered lots of awards, of which young Juan José got a fairly impressive share,namely the 2001 Best Actor Award given by the Cinema Writers Circle of Spain, the 2001 Best New Actor Goya and 2001 the Newcomer Award by the Spanish Actors Union. Now aged twenty-three, Juan José is still present on the Spanish screens and is on the way for a long career.
biography.name: Juan José Ballesta

biography.bio: Soulful, exotic-looking leading man Vincent Perez is known for his grand and glossy French pictures, exuding a sexy stare and irresistible charm that has swept Gallic women off their feet for over two decades. He was born in Lausanne, Switzerland, to a German mother and a Spanish businessman father. From the classical theatre stage (Paris Conservatoire, L'Ecole des Amandiers) in works ranging from Shakespeare to Chekhov, Perez became an instant romantic idol after pairing opposite slightly older femme stars Jacqueline Bisset in La maison de jade (1988) and Catherine Deneuve in the Oscar-winning film Indochine (1992). His breakthrough role, however, came as the callow, vacuous lover "Christian" opposite Gérard Depardieu's Cyrano de Bergerac (1990). The film is considered these days the definitive version of the Edmond Rostand classic. With this European success, the lithe, moody heartthrob branched out internationally, finally making his American film debut in The Crow: City of Angels (1996), taking over the vengeful title role from the late Brandon Lee who was accidentally killed in the original. The sequel proved crashingly dull and the U.S. has been surprisingly unreceptive to Perez ever since. This may be in part due to his subsequent American movies, which have included the passionless I Dreamed of Africa (2000), Bride of the Wind (2001) and Queen of the Damned (2002) with the late musical star Aaliyah. Perez has been married to model/actress Karine Silla since 1998 and they have three children, including one set of twins). Sylla also has a child by Perez's ex-co-star Gérard Depardieu. In Europe, however, Perez is an art-house favorite.
biography.name: Vincent Perez

biography.bio: Astrid Berges-Frisbey was born in Barcelona, Spain. Her father is Spanish, and her mother, who is American, is of English and French descent. She is fluent in French, Spanish, and Catalan. Astrid Berges-Frisbey made her acting debut in 2007 on french television. In 2008, she made her feature debut in the French film Un barrage contre le Pacifique (2008) and since then has made other French films. In 2011, Berges-Frisbey made her English debut as the beautiful mermaid Syrena in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides (2011). She was personally picked by director Rob Marshall and producer Jerry Bruckheimer after a whirlwind of auditions in France, Hollywood, and the UK.
biography.name: Astrid Bergès-Frisbey

biography.bio: Santi Millán was born on September 13, 1968 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Santiago Millán Montes. He is an actor and director, known for Boqueria 357 (2007), 7 vidas (1999) and La cellule de Fermat (2007).
biography.name: Santi Millán

biography.bio: Nicolas Giraud was born on November 12, 1978 in Saintes, Charente-Maritime, France. He is an actor and director, known for Taken (2008), Les aventures extraordinaires d'Adèle Blanc-Sec (2010) and Loin des hommes (2014).
biography.name: Nicolas Giraud

biography.bio: Moussa Maaskri was born on November 15, 1962 in Chelghoum Laïd, Algeria. He is an actor and writer, known for Vidocq (2001), Two Brothers (2004) and Point Blank (2010).
biography.name: Moussa Maaskri

biography.bio: Jérôme Le Banner was born on December 26, 1972 in Le Havre, France. He is an actor, known for Babylon A.D. (2008), Astérix aux jeux olympiques (2008) and Bruc, the Manhunt (2010).
biography.name: Jérôme Le Banner

biography.bio: Justin Blanckaert is an actor, known for High Lane (2009), Bruc, the Manhunt (2010) and Eden à l'Ouest (2009).
biography.name: Justin Blanckaert

biography.bio: Francesc Albiol was born in 1957 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Francesc Albiol Navarro. He is an actor, known for Le parfum - Histoire d'un meurtrier (2006), Bruc, the Manhunt (2010) and To Die (Or Not) (2000).
biography.name: Francesc Albiol

biography.placeOfBirth: Ciutadella de Minorca, Balearic Islands, Spain
biography.bio: Blai Llopis was born in 1954 in Ciutadella de Minorca, Balearic Islands, Spain. He is an actor, known for [REC] 3: Genesis (2012), Bruc, the Manhunt (2010) and El mar (2000).
biography.name: Blai Llopis

biography.bio: Albert Vidal was born in September 1946 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor and director, known for 1492: Christophe Colomb (1992), Golden Balls (1993) and Lettres d'Alou (1990).
biography.name: Albert Vidal

biography.bio: Marcel Borràs was born on November 27, 1989 in Olot, Girona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor, known for Three Steps Above Heaven (2010), Twilight Love 2 (2012) and Puzzled Love (2011).
biography.name: Marcel Borràs

biography.bio: Cristina Cervià is an actress, known for Bruc, the Manhunt (2010), L'Exorcisme (2010) and Blog (2010).
biography.name: Cristina Cervià

biography.bio: Jordi Coromina is an actor, known for Bruc, the Manhunt (2010), Duna y el ogro (2001) and Vorvik (2005).
biography.name: Jordi Coromina

biography.bio: Joan Bentallé was born on August 23, 1963 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor and writer, known for Everlasting Love (2014), Tres días de libertad (1996) and Salvador (Puig Antich) (2006).
biography.name: Joan Bentallé
